revised_title: Cape Frio Treasure Recovery: Diving Bell and Underwater Operations
tldr: In 1832, a team led by Commander De Roos attempted to recover treasure and stores from the wreck of the Thetis, which had sunk in a cove near Cape Frio. They used a diving bell to explore the underwater area and moved large rocks to access the treasures. The team successfully recovered 15/16ths of the property and returned to Rio de Janeiro without any loss of life.
